ygData.subject: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought they were looking into the whole business of the inferior mez never being overwritten by the superior mez? I really wish they would do that. I think
ygData.messageBody:
I thought they were looking into the whole business of the inferior mez
never being overwritten by the superior mez? I really wish they would do
that. I think bards would be much more enchanter friendly then as we could
fast mez the spares when you get a big pull and the chanter would then have
a few extra seconds to target and cast their better mez. I think it would
save tons of chanter deaths.

Anyone know anything about killing the CS otters? Are they on any faction
with dragons, giants, or dwarves? I need something to tailor above 158.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
